players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana is dead. This is terrible. Bob, Alice, what do you think happened?"
Bob: "I don't know what happened, Charlie. It's frightening. We should all share our suspicions carefully."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."
You: "I stand by my investigation; Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out immediately to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice, if Bob is the mafioso, why didn't you say anything during the first discussion round? It seems suspicious that you're only revealing this now, after Diana's death."
Bob: "Alice, your accusation against me seems convenient now. If you investigated me last night, why wait? Maybe you're the one hiding something—we should vote you out instead."
